00026 #ifndef EMSOCKET_H
00027 #define EMSOCKET_H
00028 
00029 #include "EncryptedStreamSocket.h"              // Needed for CEncryptedStreamSocket
00030 
00031 #include "ThrottledSocket.h"    // Needed for ThrottledFileSocket
00032 
00033 class CPacket;
00034 
00035 #define ERR_WRONGHEADER     0x01
00036 #define ERR_TOOBIG          0x02
00037 
00038 #define ES_DISCONNECTED     0xFF
00039 #define ES_NOTCONNECTED     0x00
00040 #define ES_CONNECTED        0x01
00041 
00042 
00043 const uint32 PACKET_HEADER_SIZE = 6;
00044 
00045 
00046 class CEMSocket : public CEncryptedStreamSocket, public ThrottledFileSocket
00047 {
00048 public:
00049     CEMSocket(const CProxyData *ProxyData = NULL);
00050     virtual ~CEMSocket();
00051     
00052     virtual void    SendPacket(CPacket* packet, bool delpacket = true, bool controlpacket = true, uint32 actualPayloadSize = 0);
00053     bool    IsConnected() { return byConnected==ES_CONNECTED;};
00054     uint8   GetConState()   {return byConnected;}
00055     void    SetDownloadLimit(uint32 limit);
00056     void    DisableDownloadLimit();
00057 
00058     virtual uint32  GetTimeOut() const;
00059     virtual void    SetTimeOut(uint32 uTimeOut);
00060     
00061     uint32  GetLastCalledSend() { return lastCalledSend; }
00062 
00063     uint64  GetSentBytesCompleteFileSinceLastCallAndReset();
00064     uint64  GetSentBytesPartFileSinceLastCallAndReset();
00065     uint64  GetSentBytesControlPacketSinceLastCallAndReset();
00066     uint64  GetSentPayloadSinceLastCallAndReset();
00067     void    TruncateQueues();
00068 
00069     virtual SocketSentBytes SendControlData(uint32 maxNumberOfBytesToSend, uint32 minFragSize) { return Send(maxNumberOfBytesToSend, minFragSize, true); };
00070     virtual SocketSentBytes SendFileAndControlData(uint32 maxNumberOfBytesToSend, uint32 minFragSize) { return Send(maxNumberOfBytesToSend, minFragSize, false); };
00071 
00072     uint32  GetNeededBytes();
00073     
00074     void    Destroy();
00075     bool OnDestroy() { return DoingDestroy; };
00076     
00077     //protected:
00078     // these functions are public on our code because of the amuleDlg::socketHandler
00079     virtual void    OnError(int WXUNUSED(nErrorCode)) { };
00080     virtual void    OnSend(int nErrorCode); 
00081     virtual void    OnReceive(int nErrorCode);
00082     
00083 protected:
00084 
00085     virtual bool    PacketReceived(CPacket* WXUNUSED(packet)) { return false; };
00086     virtual void    OnClose(int nErrorCode);
00087     
00088     uint8   byConnected;
00089     uint32  m_uTimeOut;
00090 
00091 private:
00092     virtual SocketSentBytes Send(uint32 maxNumberOfBytesToSend, uint32 minFragSize, bool onlyAllowedToSendControlPacket);
00093     void    ClearQueues();  
00094 
00095     uint32  GetNextFragSize(uint32 current, uint32 minFragSize);
00096     bool    HasSent() { return m_hasSent; }
00097     
00098     // Download (pseudo) rate control   
00099     uint32  downloadLimit;
00100     bool    downloadLimitEnable;
00101     bool    pendingOnReceive;
00102 
00103     // Download partial header
00104     byte    pendingHeader[PACKET_HEADER_SIZE];
00105     uint32  pendingHeaderSize;
00106 
00107     // Download partial packet
00108     byte*   pendingPacket;
00109     uint32  pendingPacketSize;
00110 
00111     // Upload control
00112     byte*   sendbuffer;
00113     uint32  sendblen;
00114     uint32  sent;
00115 
00116     typedef std::list<CPacket*> CPacketQueue;
00117     CPacketQueue m_control_queue;
00118 
00119     struct StandardPacketQueueEntry
00120     {
00121         uint32 actualPayloadSize;
00122         CPacket* packet;
00123     };
00124 
00125     typedef std::list<StandardPacketQueueEntry> CStdPacketQueue;
00126     CStdPacketQueue m_standard_queue;
00127     
00128     bool m_currentPacket_is_controlpacket;
00129 
00130     wxMutex m_sendLocker;
00131 
00132     uint64 m_numberOfSentBytesCompleteFile;
00133     uint64 m_numberOfSentBytesPartFile;
00134     uint64 m_numberOfSentBytesControlPacket;
00135     bool m_currentPackageIsFromPartFile;
00136 
00137     bool    m_bAccelerateUpload;
00138     uint32  lastCalledSend;
00139     uint32  lastSent;
00140     uint32  lastFinishedStandard;
00141 
00142     uint32 m_actualPayloadSize;
00143     uint32 m_actualPayloadSizeSent;
00144 
00145     bool m_bBusy;
00146     bool m_hasSent;
00147 
00148     bool DoingDestroy;
00149 };
